title: Sugar Cookie
description: A simple sugar cookie, glazed with vanilla frosting and decorated with rainbow sprinkles!

title: Devil's Food Cake
description: A layer cake baked with the Devil's own recipe! Made with real chocolate baking squares. The flavor is to DIE for!

title: Glazed Donut
description: A basic fried and glazed doughnut. Mundane, but delicious!

title: Croissant
description: A classic, crescent-shaped French pastry! WARNING: It may recall memories best left forgotten.

title: Black Coffee
description: Espresso coffee, served black (like your soul)!

title: Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: A classic cookie, made with chocolate chips. Please ignore any screaming coming from the cookie.

title: Macaron
description: A meringue-based cookie that originates from France, the most DEVILISH of nations.

title: Chocolate Supreme Cookie
description: A dark chocolate cookie, baked with white chocolate and milk chocolate chunks. All chocolate was harvested with extra human suffering.

title: Soul Cookie
description: Made with REAL human souls! Soul-flavored substitute available on request for vegetarians and vegans.

title: Tempting Apple Cake
description: A cake featuring apples harvested directly from the Tree of Knowledge, topped with caramel icing. Taste it, and you too will understand Eve's temptation!

title: Angel Cake
description: A sponge cake baked with an AUTHENTIC, immortal angel! You can taste its delicious suffering with every bite! Available only as whole cakes.

title: Heart Doughnut
description: A heart-shaped doughnut, filled with blood-flavored strawberry jam!

title: Devil's Mini Doughnuts
description: Chocolate mini doughnuts, so delicious that you will become hopelessly addicted to the flavor for ALL ETERNITY!

title: Crêpes Suzette
description: A French dessert consisting of a crêpe, topped with a sauce of caramel and butter, served flambé with the fires of the Hells!

title: Éclair
description: An oblong pastry made with choux dough and topped with chocolate icing! EXCLUSIVELY baked by French orphans!

title: Bloody Mary
description: An alcholic cocktail containing vodka and the GENUINE blood of the Virgin Mary herself! Not available for those under the age of 21 or those without valid ID.
